attributes.additional_details: Council tax was generated in order to help with austerity , as we all know the austerity has ended and yet we have seen no reduction in council tax that should of been wiped off completely . it is an unfair payment knowing that we are already paying enough towards our income tax and national insurance contributions , not forgetting all the expensive bills we are already facing .
attributes.background: Council tax has caused many families to be dragged into unwanted debts , think about how many bills that council tax payment can pay off . It isn't fair to pay over £150 a month towards an anonymous payments.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's about something the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors.
